```{r}
#### Workspace setup ####
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
# Get 
#Code referenced from: https://tellingstorieswithdata.com/02-drinking_from_a_fire_hose.html
study_2_raw_data <-
  read_csv(
    file =
      "https://osf.io/download/xyev5/",
    show_col_types = FALSE,
  )

# Save Study 2 raw data
write_csv(
  x = study_2_raw_data,
  file = "study_2_raw_data.csv"
)
```
